summary.summary_text:
- LtraID backup allows for easy restoration of data, including entire tenants, within seconds. 
-  A special offer includes three months free with a one-year or 100 license contract for LtraID backup.
- Current SaaS Protection and Spanning customers receive an increased business credit when bringing LtraID Backup to their clients.
- The new Next Generation Partner series features desktop appliances optimized for performance using DCDR-optimized C-commutes.
-  Series six appliances offer up to 120 terabytes of storage capacity, Intel processors, and faster RAM compared to previous generations.
- A migration tool simplifies moving from Series five to Series six appliances. 
- The BCR FastTrack hardware offers a 50% discount on maintenance for the first year and includes six months free of SaaS-Baka platform with a two-year subscription.
bullet_points: LtraID backup allows for easy restoration of data, including entire tenants, within seconds.
A special offer includes three months free with a one-year or 100 license contract for LtraID backup.
Current SaaS Protection and Spanning customers receive an increased business credit when bringing LtraID Backup to their clients.
The new Next Generation Partner series features desktop appliances optimized for performance using DCDR-optimized C-commutes.
Series six appliances offer up to 120 terabytes of storage capacity, Intel processors, and faster RAM compared to previous generations.
A migration tool simplifies moving from Series five to Series six appliances.
The BCR FastTrack hardware offers a 50% discount on maintenance for the first year and includes six months free of SaaS-Baka platform with a two-year subscription.

action_items.task: Follow up with attendees for feedback on new products
action_items.context: Discussed new product features and capabilities. Feedback from attendees is important for further development.

action_items.task: Provide free first three months for LtraID backup to customers with 12 month or 100 license contract
action_items.context: Offered as an incentive for signing long-term contracts for LtraID backup services.

action_items.task: Create marketing materials for Next Generation Partner and BCR FastTrack hardware offers
action_items.context: New product offers were discussed in the meeting. Marketing materials need to be created to promote these offers.

action_items.task: Develop migration tool for series five to series six appliances
action_items.context: Mentioned as a key feature to simplify migrations between product versions.

action_items.task: Implement extended estate deal for customers with losers
action_items.context: New contract terms discussed to help customers redeploy appliances and start earning money faster.

keywords: Migration Tool Series Five to Six
